content: this simple project is perfect for new knitters to practice all the essentials of knitting casting on garter stitch stockinette stitch ribbing binding off and mattress stitch this pattern is used as a teaching aid at our beginner knitting classes at yak 1 in brighton kits including everything needed to make the mitts are available from yak 2 and make the perfect gift for an aspiring knitter please add your projects on ravelry and use the hashtag #beginnermitts on your instagram photos so we can show them some love 1 https //yarnandknitting com/ 2 https //yarnandknitting com/product/learn-to-knit-kit-beginner-mitts/
